casebody.data:
Matthew YOUNG, Petitioner-Appellant,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent-Appellee. SC: 157399
COA: 331352 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 21, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it appearing to this Court that the case of Henderson v. Civil Serv Comm (Docket No. 156270) is pending on appeal before this Court and that the decision in that case may resolve an issue raised in the present application for leave to appeal, we ORDER that the application be held in ABEYANCE pending the decision in that case.
